EmailTemplate.subject: turbonomic (vmturbo) revisit and mlb all-star game raffle (1495550916.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Jim, Hope you are having a great Tuesday morning! I understand that you have had conversations with a few of my colleges in the past and I wanted to reach out to let you know that we are running a special promotion for meeting with us over the next month! If you complete an introductory meeting with Turbonomic before June 23rd, we will enter you in a raffle to win a trip for two (2) to the 2017 MLB All-Star Game in Miami, Florida from July 9 - 12, 2017. If you’d like to be entered, you can visit this page <[[http://mkto-sjp0104.com/ol/jE9ZdMXLKlxQsRpg5uiMMKvivTDUe5u9qKgwWbq2n59ziQVuYOPLdRGphcBWFZZvNa%2DaCAZNQsIylEpLFL3FOoVJ%5FqhJGUCkUSiyiKTTY61ceKJ2ztJo%2D62t3WEJvtWBk07JR0ELVDd5bQLAOfklnCn1Mc0Oazaf%5FFPvLL5xkCM4sZRW%2DJiZJbGD3WOi0kjN3AGGOH5Kws2h3XntIK1by%5FolllUKzHU8R9On6xjjzrYJnQMhz%2DZOlzE90%2DRdB%5FByzyDZRwrp3d%5F%2DaNJ3QOfiydbFmuQTPTgusb0fbluDB1SwAtOUQwVH6CKqpGQ7PBF4JD0DHe4ZvwW87yJOccMgFxm5l3An7Fk47KUAy4uq4D%2DocVrzBRjEsRP5x1%2DJDqcX%2DFewj90HzC3uBhv909dNAXyZJ%5FHl%5FmikfKPvongDdPFLevVPd%5FDWjw%2C%2C/j0lQecLJLFlNoVdlsbPWNrz%5FnTrOdZWhuPJ%2DBvqp38M8lElyfqHcLED9xdZJDJcgbOyQAgddFJl3xQ1PG%5FnaI41L7spJBErvCiPKoYrgZa5MIZpK05E087iz62Mu%5FOWsmGjWPklaUSZ%5Fdg7JSLkMim7zI8JxVA%2DU%5Fi3tF7cVqW1boQ%2C%2C]]>, or just let me know and I will work with you directly to schedule our meeting and put you into the raffle. I would love the opportunity to meet with you to see if Turbonomic would be valuable to you and your team. Thanks,Maggie Margaret Schroeder - Turbonomic Sales Development Representative O: 857.305.4608 C: 802.440.2128 500 Boylston Street, Boston, MA 02116
